text.en: This site will be useful for financiers, financial analysts, traders, economists, and anyone interested in market cycles. I create financial statistical websites and dashboards. I work with charts, perform analysis, provide forecasts, and give recommendations. (The site is currently under development)
text.si: Ta spletna stran bo koristna za financerje, finanƒçne analitike, trgovce, ekonomiste in vse, ki jih zanimajo tr≈æni cikli. Ustvarjam finanƒçne statistiƒçne spletne strani in nadzorne plo≈°ƒçe (dashboards). Delam z grafi, izvajam analize, pripravljam napovedi in podajam priporoƒçila. (Spletna stran je trenutno v razvoju)

extra.en: Commentary

text.en:
Global M2 represents the total M2 money supply in the global economy ‚Äî a broad measure of liquidity that includes:
‚úî cash in circulation
‚úî demand deposits
‚úî savings deposits
‚úî other highly liquid financial instruments

These aggregates measure how much money is available in the economy for spending, investment, and lending.

üîπ Important: Global M2 is a macroeconomic indicator, not an on-chain blockchain metric. It is based on reports from major central banks (USA, Eurozone, China, Japan, etc.) and reflects global fiat currency liquidity.

How Global M2 affects the market and Bitcoin price

Relationship between Global M2 and BTC:
‚úî Numerous studies and charts show that growth in global money supply often coincides with rising Bitcoin prices ‚Äî although the relationship is not always direct or immediate.
‚úî Many analysts have observed that periods of M2 expansion historically aligned with BTC bull phases.
‚úî Global liquidity tends to impact risk assets (stocks, crypto) more strongly than conservative assets.
‚úî Some analysts suggest a time lag (~12 weeks) between Global M2 growth and BTC price movements.
‚úî Certain analytical models have found a statistical relationship between money supply growth and BTC (e.g., during 2015‚Äì2025).

Why Global M2 matters:
üá∫üá∏ Global M2 reflects cash and deposits that can potentially flow into financial markets.
When Global M2 increases ‚Üí available liquidity rises, part of which may:
‚úî flow into risk assets
‚úî support demand for BTC as an alternative asset
‚úî increase pressure on fiat currencies through inflation (theoretically)

This is why analysts closely monitor Global M2 as a macro indicator of liquidity and risk appetite.
text.si:
Globalni M2 predstavlja skupno denarno maso M2 v svetovnem gospodarstvu ‚Äî ≈°irok kazalnik likvidnosti, ki vkljuƒçuje:
‚úî gotovino v obtoku
‚úî depozite na vpogled
‚úî varƒçevalne vloge
‚úî druga visoko likvidna sredstva

Ti agregati merijo, koliko denarja je na voljo v gospodarstvu za potro≈°njo, nalo≈æbe in kreditiranje.

üîπ Pomembno: Globalni M2 je makroekonomski kazalnik, ne on-chain metrika verige blokov. Temelji na poroƒçilih centralnih bank veƒçjih dr≈æav (ZDA, evroobmoƒçje, Kitajska, Japonska itd.) in odra≈æa globalno likvidnost fiat valut.

Kako Globalni M2 vpliva na trg in ceno Bitcoina

Povezava med Globalnim M2 in BTC:
‚úî ≈†tevilne ≈°tudije in grafi ka≈æejo, da rast globalne denarne mase pogosto sovpada z rastjo cene Bitcoina ‚Äî ƒçeprav povezava ni vedno neposredna ali takoj≈°nja.
‚úî Analitiki opa≈æajo, da so se obdobja ≈°irjenja M2 zgodovinsko ujemala z bikovskimi fazami BTC.
‚úî Globalna likvidnost pogosto bolj vpliva na tvegana sredstva (delnice, kripto) kot na konzervativne nalo≈æbe.
‚úî Obstajajo predpostavke o ƒçasovnem zamiku (~12 tednov) med rastjo Globalnega M2 in gibanjem cene BTC.
‚úî Nekateri analitiƒçni modeli so odkrili statistiƒçno povezavo med rastjo denarne mase in BTC (npr. v obdobju 2015‚Äì2025).

Zakaj je Globalni M2 pomemben:
üá∫üá∏ Globalni M2 predstavlja gotovino in depozite, ki se lahko potencialno prelijejo na finanƒçne trge.
ƒåe Globalni M2 raste ‚Üí razpolo≈æljiva likvidnost se poveƒçuje, del te pa lahko:
‚úî preide v tvegana sredstva
‚úî podpira povpra≈°evanje po BTC kot alternativnem sredstvu
‚úî poveƒça pritisk na fiat valute prek inflacije (teoretiƒçno)

Zato analitiki spremljajo Globalni M2 kot makroekonomski kazalnik likvidnosti in nagnjenosti k tveganju.

extra.en:
ANALYSIS as of 02.01.2026.

Global M2 money supply continues to expand, though growth rates remain moderate.
M2 growth has been observed in the United States, the Eurozone, and other major economies.

Despite rising M2, Bitcoin price movements have at times diverged from a direct correlation (for example, during summer 2025, a divergence between BTC and Global M2 was observed).

This suggests that while global liquidity remains high, its impact on BTC price is indirect ‚Äî transmitted through demand, investor sentiment, and capital flows.

Global M2 impact outlook:

Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks): moderate and indirect influence ‚Äî Global M2 should not be viewed as a short-term price trigger.

Medium-term (1‚Äì6 months): continued monetary expansion may support BTC through increased risk appetite and capital availability.

Long-term (12+ months): Global M2 remains a key macro factor ‚Äî rising liquidity supports capital-intensive assets such as Bitcoin.
extra.si:
ANALIZA na dan 02.01.2026.

Globalna denarna masa M2 se ≈°e naprej poveƒçuje, vendar z zmernimi stopnjami rasti.
Rast M2 je bila zaznana v ZDA, evroobmoƒçju in drugih veƒçjih gospodarstvih.

Kljub rasti M2 je gibanje cene Bitcoina obƒçasno odstopalo od neposredne korelacije (na primer poleti 2025 je bila opa≈æena divergenca med BTC in Globalnim M2).

To pomeni, da globalna likvidnost ostaja visoka, vendar njen vpliv na ceno BTC poteka posredno ‚Äî prek povpra≈°evanja, razpolo≈æenja vlagateljev in kapitalskih tokov.

Napoved vpliva Globalnega M2 na Bitcoin:

Kratkoroƒçno (1‚Äì4 tedne): zmeren in posreden vpliv ‚Äî Globalni M2 ni kratkoroƒçni spro≈æilec cene.

Srednjeroƒçno (1‚Äì6 mesecev): nadaljnja denarna ekspanzija lahko ustvari ugodno okolje za BTC zaradi veƒçje nagnjenosti k tveganju in razpolo≈æljivosti kapitala.

Dolgoroƒçno (12+ mesecev): Globalni M2 ostaja pomemben makro dejavnik ‚Äî rast likvidnosti podpira kapitalsko intenzivna sredstva, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom.

text.en: Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level. Analysis 5.01.2026. TREAST value is approximately 4,227,801 million dollars (~4,227 trillion USD) ‚Äî slightly higher than previous weeks. fred.stlouisfed.org This means that at the end of 2025, the Fed held a significant volume of Treasury securities on its balance sheet and did not sharply reduce its holdings in recent weeks. How to interpret TREAST dynamics Fed balance sheet and base liquidity The Fed's balance sheet includes many assets (Treasuries, mortgage-backed securities, etc.). At the end of 2025, it slightly increased compared to previous data, indicating support for monetary liquidity at current levels. If TREAST is stable or slowly growing, this means the Fed is not aggressively reducing liquidity and not selling large bond packages. Impact on markets and Bitcoin price Direct impact on liquidity TREAST is not a traded asset, it is the balance sheet volume of Fed assets reflecting US monetary policy. It does not directly affect Bitcoin price but is an important indicator of liquidity in the global financial system. How TREAST affects markets Fed balance growth or stability (TREAST growth/plateau) Liquidity support, potentially softer financial conditions May contribute to increased risk appetite among investors. High-risk assets (tech sector stocks, cryptocurrencies) receive indirect support. Fed balance reduction (sharp TREAST decrease) Liquidity squeeze, rising rates Pressure on risk assets and market liquidity decline. TREAST forecast Short-term perspective (1‚Äì4 weeks) Based on recent weeks' data: TREAST remains relatively stable with slight growth, this may signal a passive or moderate monetary stance by the Fed, without sharp QT. Short-term this means absence of strong liquidity pressure on markets and relatively favorable background for risk assets. Medium-term perspective (1‚Äì3 months) In medium-term perspective, the following scenarios are possible: If balance remains stable or grows, this indicates broad monetary liquidity, which historically supports weaker dollar conditions and can be favorable for growing markets and Bitcoin. If signals of increased Fed bond sales appear, this may create moderate liquidity pressure, especially if inflation expectations rise and Fed intensifies QT. Long-term perspective (6‚Äì24 months) Long-term TREAST direction largely depends on Fed monetary policy in response to inflation, economic data, and recession risks. If Fed returns to softer policy or resumes purchases (QE), TREAST may grow. This would mean increased dollar liquidity, which historically supports risk assets including Bitcoin. If Fed continues QT and reduces balance, TREAST will decline, potentially indicating tighter financing conditions and reduced appetite for risky assets. How this may affect Bitcoin Bitcoin is not directly dependent on TREAST but reacts to changes in global liquidity and monetary policy: Increased liquidity (TREAST growth/plateau) ‚Äî potentially positive signal for Bitcoin, stocks, and crypto market. TREAST reduction / intensified QT ‚Äî may reduce risk appetite and negatively affect Bitcoin. These influences manifest through global financial conditions and investor risk appetite, not through direct transaction mechanisms. Conclusion Current TREAST level on 5.01.2026 indicates holding significant Treasury volume on Fed balance with moderate growth. This reflects relatively neutral-supportive monetary stance without aggressive QT. Short-term forecast: stable background, possible moderate support for risk assets including Bitcoin. Medium-term forecast: if balance remains stable, this will support current markets; start of significant QT will create pressure. Long-term forecast: depends on Fed monetary policy: balance expansion creates favorable conditions for risk assets, balance reduction limits risk appetite.
text.si: Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level. Analiza 5.01.2026. Vrednost TREAST je pribli≈æno 4.227.801 milijonov dolarjev (~4.227 bilijonov USD) ‚Äî rahlo vi≈°ja od preteklih tednov. fred.stlouisfed.org To pomeni, da je konec leta 2025 Fed na svoji bilanci dr≈æal znaten obseg ameri≈°kih dr≈æavnih obveznic in v zadnjih tednih dejansko ni ostro zmanj≈°al svojih nalo≈æb. Kako interpretirati dinamiko TREAST Bilanca Feda in osnovna likvidnost Bilanca Feda vkljuƒçuje ≈°tevilne aktive (Treasuries, hipotekarske vrednostne papirje itd.). Konec leta 2025 se je rahlo poveƒçala v primerjavi s preteklimi podatki, kar ka≈æe na podporo monetarne likvidnosti na trenutnih nivojih. ƒåe je TREAST stabilen ali poƒçasi nara≈°ƒça, to pomeni, da Fed ne agresivno zmanj≈°uje likvidnosti in ne prodaja velikih paketov obveznic. Vpliv na trge in ceno Bitcoina Neposreden vpliv na likvidnost TREAST ni trgovski aktiv, temveƒç je obseg aktivov na bilanci Feda, ki odra≈æa monetarno politiko ZDA. Neposredno ne vpliva na ceno Bitcoina, vendar je pomemben indikator likvidnosti v globalnem finanƒçnem sistemu. Kako TREAST vpliva na trge Rast ali stabilnost bilance Feda (rast/plato TREAST) Podpora likvidnosti, potencialno mehkej≈°i finanƒçni pogoji Lahko prispeva k poveƒçanju apetita po tveganju med vlagatelji. Aktivi z visokim tveganjem (delnice tehnolo≈°kega sektorja, kriptovalute) dobijo posredno podporo. Zmanj≈°anje bilance Feda (ostro zmanj≈°anje TREAST) Stiskanje likvidnosti, dvig obrestnih mer Pritisk na riziƒçne aktive in upad likvidnosti na trgih. Napoved TREAST Kratkoroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì4 tedne) Na podlagi trenutnih podatkov zadnjih tednov: TREAST ostaja relativno stabilen z rahlim rastjo, kar lahko signalizira pasivno ali zmerno monetarno dr≈æo Feda brez ostrih QT. Kratkoroƒçno to pomeni odsotnost moƒçnega pritiska likvidnosti na trge in relativno ugoden ozadje za riziƒçne aktive. Srednjeroƒçna perspektiva (1‚Äì3 mesece) V srednjeroƒçni perspektivi so mo≈æni naslednji scenariji: ƒåe bilanca ostane stabilna ali raste, to ka≈æe na ≈°iroko monetarno likvidnost, ki zgodovinsko podpira ≈°ibkej≈°e dolarjeve pogoje in je lahko ugodna za rastoƒçe trge in Bitcoin. ƒåe se bodo pojavili signali poveƒçanih prodaj obveznic Feda, lahko to ustvari zmeren pritisk na likvidnost, ≈°e posebej ƒçe bodo inflacijske napovedi rasle in Fed intenzivira QT. Dolgooroƒçna perspektiva (6‚Äì24 mesecev) Dolgooroƒçna smer TREAST v veliki meri dependira od monetarne politike Feda v odziv na inflacijo, ekonomske podatke in tveganja recesije. ƒåe se bo Fed vrnil k mehkej≈°i politiki ali obnovil nakupe (QE), se lahko TREAST poveƒça. To bo pomenilo poveƒçano dolarjevo likvidnost, ki zgodovinsko podpira riziƒçne aktive, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom. ƒåe bo Fed nadaljeval QT in zmanj≈°eval bilanco, se bo TREAST zmanj≈°eval, kar lahko ka≈æe na stro≈æje pogoje financiranja in potencialno zmanj≈°anje apetita po riziƒçnih aktivih. Kako to lahko vpliva na Bitcoin Bitcoin ni neposredno odvisen od TREAST, vendar reagira na spremembe v globalni likvidnosti in monetarni politiki: Poveƒçana likvidnost (rast/plato TREAST) ‚Äî potencialno pozitiven signal za Bitcoin, delnice in kripto trg. Zmanj≈°anje TREAST / intenziviranje QT ‚Äî lahko zmanj≈°a apetit po tveganju in negativno vpliva na Bitcoin. Ti vplivi se ka≈æejo prek globalnih finanƒçnih pogojev in apetita vlagateljev po tveganju, ne prek neposrednih mehanizmov poslov. Zakljuƒçek Trenutna raven TREAST na 5.01.2026 ka≈æe na zadr≈æevanje znatnega obsega Treasuries na bilanci Feda z zmerno rastjo. To odra≈æa relativno nevtralno-podporno monetarno dr≈æo brez agresivnega QT. Kratkoroƒçna napoved: stabilen ozadje, mo≈æna zmerna podpora riziƒçnim aktivom, vkljuƒçno z Bitcoinom. Srednjeroƒçna napoved: ƒçe bo bilanca ostala stabilna, bo to podprlo trenutne trge; zaƒçetek znatnega QT bo ustvaril pritisk. Dolgooroƒçna napoved: odvisna od monetarne politike Feda: ≈°iritev bilance ustvarja ugodne pogoje za riziƒçne aktive, zmanj≈°anje bilance omejuje apetit po tveganju.

extra.en: TREAST is a ticker in the FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data) database corresponding to the indicator: "Assets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level" In simple terms, this is the volume of US Treasury bonds on the Federal Reserve's balance sheet, recorded as of Wednesday each week. This is one of the key components of the Fed's balance sheet and a direct indicator of: quantitative easing (QE), quantitative tightening (QT), overall dollar liquidity in the financial system. Economic meaning of the indicator When the Fed buys Treasury bonds: TREAST indicator grows, reserves enter the banking system, liquidity increases. When the Fed reduces bond volume: TREAST falls, liquidity is withdrawn, financial conditions tighten. Thus, TREAST shows how actively the Fed expands or contracts monetary conditions through the government debt market. How TREAST affects financial markets TREAST growth = increased liquidity, reduced interest rate pressure, increased risk appetite. Usually supports: stock indices, tech stocks, cryptocurrencies, commodities. TREAST decline = reduced liquidity, higher borrowing costs, investors move to safe-haven assets. Usually pressures: growth stocks, high-risk assets, Bitcoin and altcoins. Impact on Bitcoin price Bitcoin is not directly linked to the Fed's balance sheet but is extremely sensitive to dollar liquidity. Historical logic: Fed balance expansion ‚Üí growth of available capital ‚Üí part of liquidity flows to BTC, balance reduction ‚Üí liquidity shortage ‚Üí pressure on BTC price. In many cycles, TREAST dynamics led Bitcoin movement by several weeks or months, especially during monetary regime changes. How TREAST is used in forecasts and trading 1. Macro market regime indicator TREAST growth ‚Äî bullish macro background, TREAST decline ‚Äî defensive regime. Traders use it as a filter: in growing TREAST prefer long positions, in declining ‚Äî caution or hedging. 2. Fed policy change indicator TREAST decline slowdown or stabilization often signals: QT ending, possible pause, preparation for policy easing. Markets usually react in advance, even before official Fed statements. 3. Combination with other liquidity indicators TREAST is rarely used alone. It is analyzed together with: total Fed balance (WALCL), Reverse Repo (RRP), Treasury General Account (TGA), Global M2. Signal coincidence strengthens medium-term trend probability. Indicator limitations weekly data, not suitable for intraday trading; market impact manifests with time lag; short-term BTC movements may completely ignore TREAST due to news or speculative demand
extra.si: TREAST je ticker v bazi FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data), ki ustreza kazalniku: ‚ÄûAssets: Securities Held Outright: U.S. Treasury Securities: All: Wednesday Level‚Äú Preprosto reƒçeno, to je obseg ameri≈°kih dr≈æavnih obveznic (U.S. Treasuries) na bilanci Federalne rezerve, zabele≈æen po stanju na sredo vsakega tedna. To je ena kljuƒçnih komponent bilance Feda in neposreden indikator: kvantitativnega spro≈°ƒçanja (QE), kvantitativnega zaostrovanja (QT), splo≈°ne dolarjeve likvidnosti v finanƒçnem sistemu. Ekonomski pomen kazalnika Ko Fed kupuje dr≈æavne obveznice: kazalnik TREAST raste, v banƒçni sistem vstopijo rezerve, likvidnost se poveƒça. Ko Fed zmanj≈°uje obseg obveznic: TREAST pada, likvidnost se umika, finanƒçni pogoji se zaostrujejo. Tako TREAST ka≈æe, kako aktivno Fed prek trga dr≈æavnega dolga ≈°iri ali stiska monetarne pogoje. Kako TREAST vpliva na finanƒçne trge. Rast TREAST = poveƒçana likvidnost, zmanj≈°an pritisk obrestnih mer, poveƒçan apetit po tveganju. Obiƒçajno podpira: delni≈°ke indekse, tehnolo≈°ke delnice, kriptovalute, surovine. Padec TREAST = zmanj≈°ana likvidnost, vi≈°ji stro≈°ki zadol≈æevanja, vlagatelji be≈æijo v varne aktiv. Obiƒçajno pritiska na: delnice rasti, visoko tvegane aktiv, Bitcoin in altcoine. Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina Bitcoin ni neposredno povezan z bilanco Feda, vendar je izjemno obƒçutljiv na dolarjevo likvidnost. Zgodovinska logika: ≈°iritev bilance Feda ‚Üí rast razpolo≈æljivega kapitala ‚Üí del likvidnosti teƒçe v BTC, zmanj≈°anje bilance ‚Üí pomanjkanje likvidnosti ‚Üí pritisk na ceno BTC. V mnogih ciklih je dinamika TREAST vodila gibanje Bitcoina za veƒç tednov ali mesecev, ≈°e posebej v obdobjih spremembe monetarnega re≈æima. Kako se TREAST uporablja v napovedih in trgovanju 1. Makro indikator re≈æima trga rast TREAST ‚Äî bikovski makro ozadje, padec TREAST ‚Äî defenzivni re≈æim. Trgovci ga uporabljajo kot filter: v rastoƒçem TREAST prednost dolgim pozicijam, v padajoƒçem ‚Äî previdnost ali zavarovanje. 2. Indikator spremembe politike Feda Upoƒçasnitev padca TREAST ali stabilizacija pogosto signalizira: konec QT, mo≈æno pavzo, pripravo na omilitev politike. Trgi obiƒçajno reagirajo vnaprej, ≈°e pred uradnimi izjavami Feda. 3. Kombinacija z drugimi indikatorji likvidnosti. TREAST se redko uporablja sam. Analizira se skupaj z: skupno bilanco Feda (WALCL), Reverse Repo (RRP), Treasury General Account (TGA), Global M2. Sovpadanje signalov krepi verjetnost srednjeroƒçnega trenda. Omejitve kazalnika to so tedenski podatki, neprimerni za intradnevno trgovanje; vpliv na trge se ka≈æe z ƒçasovnim zamikom; kratkoroƒçna gibanja BTC lahko TREAST popolnoma spregledajo zaradi novic ali spekulativnega povpra≈°evanja

text.en: WALCL reflects the total assets of the Federal Reserve. Balance sheet expansion indicates quantitative easing, while contraction signals quantitative tightening.

extra.en: The correlation between WALCL and Bitcoin has historically been strong, particularly during liquidity expansion phases.

text.en: USINTR represents the effective U.S. federal funds rate, the Federal Reserve‚Äôs primary monetary policy tool.

extra.en: Rate cuts increase liquidity and support Bitcoin, while pauses or tightening tend to apply downward pressure.

text.en: TGA reflects the U.S. Treasury‚Äôs cash balance at the Federal Reserve and directly impacts short-term market liquidity.

extra.en: A declining TGA injects liquidity into markets and supports Bitcoin.

text.en: RMP is a Federal Reserve program involving Treasury purchases aimed at stabilizing bank reserves after QT.

extra.en: RMP increases system liquidity without initiating full-scale QE.

text.en: RWA refers to the tokenization of real-world assets, bridging traditional finance and blockchain infrastructure.

extra.en: Growth of the RWA sector attracts institutional capital and strengthens macro support for the crypto market.

text.en:
Outlook for 2026‚Äì2027

Short-term (Q1‚ÄìQ2 2026): Probability of a new recession is estimated at 35‚Äì50% (Goldman Sachs/Fed models, risks from Trump-era tariffs adding +0.5‚Äì1% inflation). NBER could declare a cycle peak in Q1 2026 if unemployment exceeds 4.5‚Äì4.7% and GDP growth falls below 1.7%.

Medium-term: If a recession occurs, it is expected to be mild (2‚Äì3 quarters, ‚àí1‚Äì2% GDP), with NBER dating in H2 2026‚ÄìQ1 2027. The expansion could extend to 72‚Äì80 months if the Fed continues rate cuts (around 65% probability in January).

Long-term: Stabilization in 2027 with a potential new expansion and unemployment around 4%. Key risk: tariffs, which could raise unemployment by approximately +1 percentage point.

Market impact

Unemployment charts and NBER dating are lagging indicators, but expectations around them drive volatility. Expansion = bullish regime: equities +10‚Äì20% annually (S&P 500 ~6800 in a stable scenario), low VIX (~18), bond gains via falling yields. Recession = bearish regime: equities ‚àí20‚Äì50%, VIX +50‚Äì100%, rotation into defensives (bonds +5‚Äì10%, USD +5%). Current low unemployment implies stability, but a rise above 4.5% increases volatility by 8‚Äì10%.

Impact on Bitcoin price

BTC shows ~0.7 correlation with equities. Expansion supports BTC upside (+120% in 2025, BTC ~$88K). Recession implies a ‚àí40‚Äì60% correction ($60K‚Äì$70K, similar to 2022). Forecast: recession risk in 2026 ‚Üí BTC $60K‚Äì$70K; continued expansion ‚Üí $100K+ supported by liquidity and ETF flows.
text.si:
Napoved za obdobje 2026‚Äì2027

Kratkoroƒçno (Q1‚ÄìQ2 2026): Verjetnost nove recesije je ocenjena na 35‚Äì50 % (modeli Goldman Sachs/Fed, tveganja zaradi Trumpovih carin +0,5‚Äì1 % inflacije). NBER bi lahko razglasil vrh cikla v Q1 2026, ƒçe brezposelnost prese≈æe 4,5‚Äì4,7 % in rast BDP pade pod 1,7 %.

Srednjeroƒçno: V primeru recesije se priƒçakuje blag scenarij (2‚Äì3 ƒçetrtletja, ‚àí1‚Äì2 % BDP), z datiranjem NBER v drugi polovici 2026 ali v Q1 2027. Ekspanzija se lahko podalj≈°a na 72‚Äì80 mesecev, ƒçe Fed nadaljuje z zni≈æevanjem obrestnih mer (verjetnost pribli≈æno 65 % v januarju).

Dolgoroƒçno: Stabilizacija v letu 2027 in morebitna nova ekspanzija z brezposelnostjo okoli 4 %. Glavno tveganje predstavljajo carine, ki bi lahko poveƒçale brezposelnost za pribli≈æno +1 odstotno toƒçko.

Vpliv na trge

Grafi brezposelnosti in datiranje NBER so zaostajajoƒçi kazalniki, vendar njihova priƒçakovanja poveƒçujejo volatilnost. Ekspanzija = bikovski trg: delnice +10‚Äì20 % letno (S&P 500 ~6800 v stabilnem scenariju), nizek VIX (~18), rast obveznic zaradi padca donosnosti. Recesija = medvedji trg: delnice ‚àí20‚Äì50 %, VIX +50‚Äì100 %, prehod v obrambne nalo≈æbe (obveznice +5‚Äì10 %, USD +5 %). Trenutno nizka brezposelnost pomeni stabilnost, vendar rast nad 4,5 % poveƒça volatilnost za 8‚Äì10 %.

Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina

BTC ima pribli≈æno 0,7 korelacijo z delni≈°kimi trgi. Ekspanzija podpira rast BTC (+120 % v letu 2025, cena ~$88K). Recesija pomeni popravek ‚àí40‚Äì60 % (razpon $60K‚Äì$70K, podobno kot leta 2022). Napoved: tveganje recesije v 2026 ‚Üí BTC $60K‚Äì$70K; nadaljevanje ekspanzije ‚Üí $100K+ ob podpori likvidnosti in ETF tokov.

extra.en: NBER Business Cycle Dating identifies the start and end of recessions and expansions in the U.S. economy. Historically, unemployment rises sharply during recessions and falls during expansions. The current level (~4.3% in Nov 2025, BLS) remains low. The increase from 3.8% in 2023 to 4.3% in 2025 is a warning signal but far below recessionary peaks (e.g., 14.8% in 2020). The expansion has continued since May 2020 (~68 months), with no new recession declared by NBER. Rising unemployment is a yellow flag, not yet critical.
extra.si: Datiranje poslovnih ciklov NBER doloƒça zaƒçetke in konce recesij ter ekspanzij v gospodarstvu ZDA. Zgodovinsko brezposelnost med recesijami moƒçno naraste, med ekspanzijami pa upada. Trenutna raven (~4,3 % v novembru 2025, BLS) ostaja nizka. Poveƒçanje z 3,8 % v letu 2023 na 4,3 % v letu 2025 je opozorilni signal, vendar precej pod recesijskimi vrhovi (npr. 14,8 % v letu 2020). Ekspanzija traja od maja 2020 (~68 mesecev), NBER ≈°e ni razglasil nove recesije. Rast brezposelnosti je "rumena zastava", ne pa kritiƒçni signal.

text.en:
NBER based Recession Indicators for the United States
Business Cycle Dating NBER is the process by which the National Bureau of Economic Research (NBER) committee determines dates of peaks (end of expansion, start of recession) and troughs (end of recession, start of expansion) in the economic cycle. The committee of 8 economists analyzes a complex of indicators (GDP, income, employment, production, sales), not just two quarters of negative GDP (this is a simplified myth). Dates are announced retrospectively (6‚Äì18 month delay) for accuracy.
text.si:
NBER kazalniki recesije za ZDA
Business Cycle Dating NBER je postopek, s katerim Nacionalni urad za ekonomska raziskovanja ZDA (NBER) doloƒça datume vrhov (peaks ‚Äî konec ekspanzije, zaƒçetek recesije) in dnov (troughs ‚Äî konec recesije, zaƒçetek ekspanzije) v ekonomskem ciklu. Odbor iz 8 ekonomistov analizira sklop kazalnikov (BDP, dohodki, zaposlenost, proizvodnja, prodaja), ne le dva ƒçetrtletja negativnega BDP (to je poenostavljena mit). Datumi se objavijo retrospektivno (zamik 6‚Äì18 mesecev) za natanƒçnost.

extra.en:
ANALYSIS as of 25.12.2025. Current cycle ‚Äî expansion since May 2020 (~68 months, record duration).
As of today, NBER has not declared a new recession. Unemployment chart since 1980 (from your NBER website screenshot) shows: unemployment historically rises during recessions (shaded areas, peaks 10‚Äì14%), falls in expansions. Current level ~4.3% (November 2025) ‚Äî low, no shaded recession after 2020. Unemployment rise from 3.8% (2023) to 4.3% (2025) ‚Äî warning sign, but below recession peaks (e.g., 14.8% in 2020). This indicates "soft landing", but risks from slowdown (NFP +119K, production ‚Äì0.1%).
Forecast for 2026‚Äì2027
Short-term (Q1‚ÄìQ2 2026): New recession probability 35‚Äì50% (Goldman Sachs/Fed models). NBER may declare peak in Q1 2026 if unemployment >4.5‚Äì4.7% and GDP <1.7%.
Medium-term: If recession, mild (2‚Äì3 quarters, -1‚Äì2% GDP), NBER dating in H2 2026‚ÄìQ1 2027. Expansion may extend to 72‚Äì80 months if Fed continues cuts (65% probability in January).
Long-term: Stabilization in 2027, new expansion with unemployment ~4%. Risks: Trump tariffs = unemployment +1 p.p.
extra.si:
ANALIZA na 25.12.2025. Trenutni cikel ‚Äî ekspanzija od maja 2020 (~68 mesecev, rekordna dol≈æina).
Danes NBER ni razglasil nove recesije. Graf brezposelnosti od 1980 (iz va≈°ega posnetka NBER spletne strani) ka≈æe: brezposelnost zgodovinsko nara≈°ƒça med recesijami (senƒçena obmoƒçja, vrhovi 10‚Äì14 %), pada v ekspanzijah. Trenutna raven ~4,3 % (november 2025) ‚Äî nizka, brez senƒçenega obmoƒçja recesije po 2020. Rast brezposelnosti z 3,8 % (2023) na 4,3 % (2025) ‚Äî opozorilni znak, a pod vrhovi recesij (npr. 14,8 % v 2020). To ka≈æe na ‚Äûmehko pristajanje‚Äú, a tveganja od upoƒçasnitve (NFP +119 tisoƒç, proizvodnja ‚Äì0,1 %).
Napoved za 2026‚Äì2027
Kratkoroƒçno (Q1‚ÄìQ2 2026): Verjetnost nove recesije 35‚Äì50 % (modeli Goldman Sachs/Fed). NBER lahko razglasi vrh v Q1 2026, ƒçe brezposelnost >4,5‚Äì4,7 % in BDP <1,7 %.
Srednjeroƒçno: ƒåe recesija, blaga (2‚Äì3 ƒçetrtletja, -1‚Äì2 % BDP), datacija NBER v H2 2026‚ÄìQ1 2027. Ekspanzija se lahko raztegne na 72‚Äì80 mesecev, ƒçe Fed nadaljuje zni≈æanja (verjetnost 65 % januarja).
Dolgooroƒçno: Stabilizacija 2027, nova ekspanzija z brezposelnostjo ~4 %. Tveganja: Carine Trumpa = rast brezposelnosti +1 p.p.

text.en:
The GDP-Based Recession Indicator Index is a quarterly measure estimating the probability that the U.S. economy was in recession during a given quarter. Values above 67% indicate a high probability of recession, while values below 33% suggest that a recession is unlikely or has ended.

The indicator is retrospective in nature and does not forecast future recessions. It is never revised once published.

extra.en: Based on Q3 2025 data, the indicator remains near historical lows, supported by strong real GDP growth of approximately 4.3%. Preliminary expectations for Q4 2025 also suggest low recession probability. Overall, the trend confirms continued economic expansion with growing, but still manageable, downside risks.

text.en:
Analysis of SBDDSA indicator (Security Brokers and Dealers; Debt Securities; Asset, Level) as of 28.12.2025 and its medium-term forecast, as well as impact on markets and Bitcoin price.

What SBDDSA means
SBDDSA is the volume of assets in debt securities held by US brokers and dealers.
This indicator actually reflects:
level of financial intermediaries' participation in debt instruments market (bonds, credit papers),


condition of broker-dealer sector balance sheets in the US financial system. FRED


üìä Data for 2025 Q2:
value: 1,279,298 million dollars (~1.28 trillion) ‚Äî long-term growth compared to previous periods. FRED


This series has been growing for several consecutive quarters:
Q2 2024 ~963 billion ‚Üí Q1 2025 ~1.17 trillion ‚Üí Q2 2025 ~1.28 trillion. FRED

üìà What broker debt securities share growth means
Growth of this indicator usually means:
1. Increase in bonds and debt securities share in brokers' balance sheets
indicates that financial intermediaries hold debt instruments longer, possibly expecting returns or for strategic reasons.


2. Increased role of debt markets in financial system
brokers accumulate debt, which may reflect expectations of interest rate changes or increased investor activity regarding fixed income.
text.si:
Analiza kazalnika SBDDSA (Vrednostni papirji posredniki in trgovci; Dolgovi vrednostni papirji; Aktiv, raven) na 28.12.2025 in njegova srednjeroƒçna napoved ter vpliv na trge in ceno bitcoina.

 Kaj pomeni SBDDSA
SBDDSA je obseg aktivov v dolgih vrednostnih papirjih pri ameri≈°kih posrednikih in trgovcih.
Ta kazalnik dejansko odra≈æa:
raven udele≈æbe finanƒçnih posrednikov na trgu dol≈æni≈°kih instrumentov (obveznice, kreditni papirji),


stanje bilanc sektorja posrednikov-trgovcev v finanƒçnem sistemu ZDA. FRED


üìä Podatki za 2025 Q2:
vrednost: 1.279.298 milijonov dolarjev (~1,28 bilijona) ‚Äî dolgoroƒçna rast glede na pretekla obdobja. FRED


Ta vrsta ≈æe veƒç ƒçetrtletij zapored raste:
Q2 2024 ~963 milijard ‚Üí Q1 2025 ~1,17 bilijona ‚Üí Q2 2025 ~1,28 bilijona. FRED

üìà Kaj pomeni rast dele≈æa dol≈æni≈°kih vrednostnih papirjev pri posrednikih
Rast tega kazalnika obiƒçajno pomeni:
1. Poveƒçanje dele≈æa obveznic in dol≈æni≈°kih papirjev v bilancah posrednikov
ka≈æe, da finanƒçni posredniki dlje ƒçasa dr≈æijo dol≈æni≈°ke instrumente, verjetno v priƒçakovanju donosov ali iz strate≈°kih razlogov.


2. Poveƒçana vloga dol≈æni≈°kih trgov v finanƒçnem sistemu
posredniki kopiƒçijo dolgove, kar lahko odra≈æa priƒçakovanja sprememb obrestnih mer ali poveƒçano aktivnost vlagateljev glede fiksnega dohodka.

extra.en:
ANALYSIS as of 25.12.2025
Current trend
Quarterly observations analysis shows consistent indicator growth:
Q2 2024 ~0.96 trillion


Q1 2025 ~1.17 trillion


Q2 2025 ~1.28 trillion. FRED


Growth indicates that brokers and dealers increased positions in debt securities, likely:
due to strategic reasons (return expectations),


borrowing costs;


or as risk hedging.



üìâ Medium-term forecast (by SBDDSA)
Based on current trend (growth for three consecutive quarters) we can assume:
1. Steady growth in coming quarters
Continued SBDDSA growth indicates:
‚úî sustained debt market activity
‚úî possible investor caution regarding risky assets
‚úî capital shift to fixed income

üìä How this affects markets overall
üü¢ Bond market and interest rates
Debt securities share growth may signal declining yields on respective papers (as demand grows).


If yields remain low, this encourages investors to seek returns in risk assets.


Market impact on stocks and risk assets
Several possible effects:
Debt assets growth ‚Üí reduced system risk
‚Äî brokers accumulate safer debt securities ‚Üí may reduce market volatility.


If brokers accumulate bonds due to stock concerns
‚Äî this potentially indicates medium-term stock caution.


Increased debt securities may signal "yield-seeking" market
‚Äî lack of stock returns ‚Üí shift to bonds.



üîé Bitcoin price impact
Bitcoin historically correlates with risk assets and market sentiment:
Potential positive effect:
‚úî If debt market stable ‚Üí reduces systemic risk
‚úî Market participants invest in BTC as alternative
‚úî Bitcoin perceived as "alternative hedging"
Potential negative effect:
‚úî Increased debt instruments share may mean:
market caution,


reduced risk appetite.


This may restrain BTC/altcoins growth in medium term.

BTC movement forecast
Based on current SBDDSA trend:
üîπ Scenario 1 (more likely ‚Äî moderate BTC growth)
If brokers hold debt securities but market stability persists, risk appetite in stocks + crypto may rise ‚Üí BTC may go up moderately.
üîπ Scenario 2 (market caution)
If SBDDSA growth reflects move to safety ‚Üí risk assets (stocks, crypto) under pressure, BTC may consolidate or decline.

Summary ‚Äî what to expect
üîç Medium-term forecast (next 3‚Äì6 months):
indicator remains at high levels and growing;


indicates high broker interest in debt securities, interpretable as moderate financial market caution.


For markets overall:
moderate stability,


possible stock volatility reduction,


cautious growth/consolidation.


For BTC:
may not get strong upward drive from risk appetite,


but will remain resilient,


consolidation phase + moderate growth likely if markets stay stable.


What to monitor soon
üî∏ Next quarter SBDDSA data (January 2026)
üî∏ Bond yield changes
üî∏ Credit market and liquidity data
üî∏ BTC correlation with risk assets

In brief:
‚û° SBDDSA growth ‚Äî financial markets caution signal.
‚û° May restrain BTC growth but not necessarily lead to decline.
‚û° Medium-term ‚Äî likely consolidation + moderate BTC growth if other economic indicators remain favorable.
‚û° Monitor further data releases and market reactions.

ANALIZA na 25.12.2025
Trenutni trend
Analiza ƒçetrtletnih opazovanj ka≈æe dosledno rast kazalnika:
Q2 2024 ~0,96 bilijona

Rast ka≈æe, da so posredniki in trgovci poveƒçali pozicije v dol≈æni≈°kih papirjih, verjetno:
z strate≈°kih razlogov (priƒçakovanja donosov),

Na podlagi trenutnega trenda (rast v treh zaporednih ƒçetrtletjih) lahko predpostavimo:

üìä Kako to vpliva na trge na splo≈°no
üü¢ Trg obveznic in obrestne mere
Rast dele≈æa dol≈æni≈°kih vrednostnih papirjev lahko signalizira padanje donosnosti ustreznih papirjev (ker povpra≈°evanje raste).


ƒåe donosnosti ostanejo nizke, to spodbuja vlagatelje k iskanju donosnosti v tveganih aktivih.


Vpliv na delnice in tvegane aktive
Veƒç mo≈ænih uƒçinkov:
Rast dol≈ænih aktivov ‚Üí zmanj≈°ano sistemsko tveganje
‚Äî posredniki kopiƒçijo varnej≈°e dol≈æni≈°ke papirje ‚Üí lahko zmanj≈°a tr≈æno nihljivost.


ƒåe posredniki kopiƒçijo obveznice zaradi skrbi za delnice
‚Äî to potencialno ka≈æe na srednjeroƒçno previdnost glede delnic.


Poveƒçanje dol≈æni≈°kih papirjev lahko signalizira trg ‚Äûv iskanju donosa"
‚Äî pomanjkanje donosnosti v delnicah ‚Üí prehod v obveznice.



üîé Vpliv na ceno bitcoina
Bitcoin zgodovinsko korelira s tveganimi aktiv in tr≈ænim razpolo≈æenjem:
Potencialno pozitiven uƒçinek:
‚úî ƒåe je dol≈æni≈°ki trg stabilen ‚Üí zmanj≈°a sistemsko tveganje
‚úî Udele≈æenci vlagajo v BTC kot alternativo
‚úî Bitcoin se dojema kot ‚Äûalternativno zavarovanje"
Potencialno negativen uƒçinek:
‚úî Poveƒçanje dele≈æa dol≈æni≈°kih instrumentov lahko pomeni:
previdnost trga,


zmanj≈°an apetit po tveganju.


To lahko omeji rast BTC/altcoinov v srednjeroƒçnem obdobju.

 Napoved gibanja BTC
Na podlagi trenutnega trenda SBDDSA:
üîπ Scenario 1 (bolj verjeten ‚Äî zmerna rast BTC)
ƒåe posredniki dr≈æijo dol≈æni≈°ke papirje, a tr≈æna stabilnost vztraja, se lahko apetit po tveganju v delnicah + kriptu poveƒça ‚Üí BTC se lahko zmerno dvigne.
üîπ Scenario 2 (previdnost trga)
ƒåe rast SBDDSA odra≈æa gibanje k varnosti ‚Üí tvegani aktiv (delnice, kripto) bodo pod pritiskom, BTC se lahko konsolidira ali zni≈æa.

 Povzetek ‚Äî kaj priƒçakovati
üîç Srednjeroƒçna napoved (naslednjih 3‚Äì6 mesecev):

Kaj spremljati kmalu

Kratek povzetek:

‚û° Spremljati nadaljnje izdaje podatkov in tr≈æne reakcije.

text.en:
ANALYSIS 25.12.2025
üîπ Indicator value
September 2025 ‚Äî 0.23%
November 2025 ‚Äî estimated at 0.43%
Value below recession threshold (0.50). YCharts+1
This means:
‚úî unemployment growing faster than a year ago
‚úî but still not exceeding critical value for automatic recession signal
‚úî economy may be slowing weakly, but not yet in full recession mode
Economists note that current period indicator may be less accurate due to post-pandemic labor market effects and demographic changes, reducing its practical reliability in isolation from other data.

Medium-term forecast (3‚Äì6 months)
Based on current Sahm Rule data:
1. Recession probability remains moderate
Indicator growing compared to last year, but hasn't reached recession threshold.
This means economy may be slowing, but no confident recession signal yet.
If index rises above 0.50, it will signal recession has started or will start in coming months.
What this may mean for markets
Stocks and risk assets
If Sahm Rule index continues rising:
Investors become cautious ‚Üí volatility increases.
Stocks may correct or form sideways movement.
If index remains below threshold:
Market risk remains moderate.
Stocks may maintain current levels or grow moderately.
Thus forecast neutral-cautious, without clear recession confirmation.

Bitcoin price impact
Bitcoin often behaves as risk asset:
growth periods ‚Äî may rise,
recession/risk periods ‚Äî fall or consolidate.
Medium-term scenarios:
üîπ 1) Indicator grows and approaches 0.50+
If SAHMREALTIME continues rising:
investors may exit risk assets ‚Üí immediate BTC pressure;
possible correlation with stock market decline.
2) Indicator remains below threshold
no clear recession signal ‚Üí calm in risk assets;
BTC may remain resilient or grow moderately with stock market.
Current value much below recession level, meaning no clear Sahm Rule recession signal. This moderately positive for BTC.

Conclusion
Current state (28.12.2025):
‚úî Sahm Rule growing, but hasn't reached recession threshold.
‚úî Unemployment increasing, but moderately.
‚úî Recession not confirmed by this indicator today.
Medium-term forecast (3‚Äì6 months):

üîπ Currently no clear signal ‚Äî markets may fluctuate or grow moderately.
Market impact:
Stocks: moderately risk-sensitive, possible correction or consolidation phases.
BTC: without clear recession higher chance to remain resilient, but still risk asset sensitive to deteriorating economic sentiment.

Vpliv na ceno Bitcoina
Bitcoin se pogosto obna≈°a kot tvegani aktiv:

ƒåe SAHMREALTIME nadaljuje rast:
vlagatelji lahko be≈æijo iz tveganih aktivov ‚Üí takoj≈°en pritisk na BTC;
mo≈æna korelacija s padcem trgov delnic.
2) Kazalnik ostane pod pragom

Zakljuƒçek
Trenutno stanje (28.12.2025):

Vpliv na trge:

BTC: brez jasne recesije veƒçje mo≈ænosti za odpornost, a ≈°e vedno ostaja tvegani aktiv, obƒçutljiv na poslab≈°anje gospodarskih razpolo≈æenj.

extra.en:
Analysis of Sahm Rule Recession Indicator (SAHMREALTIME) as of 28.12.2025, with medium-term forecast and conclusions on how this may affect financial markets and Bitcoin price.
Sahm Rule is an economic indicator developed by economist Claudia Sahm, serving as early signal of US recession start.
Based on three-month moving average unemployment level: if it rises by at least 0.50 percentage points relative to lowest level in previous 12 months ‚Äî considered recession start signal.
Indicator shows current data for September‚ÄìNovember 2025:
SAHMREALTIME ‚âà 0.23‚Äì0.43 percentage points, depending on source.
This is below 0.50 threshold, but growth observed compared to previous period.
Sahm Rule doesn't predict recession, but rather indicates it may have already started or started before official announcement.
extra.si:
Analiza kazalnika recesije Sahm Rule (SAHMREALTIME) na 28.12.2025, s srednjeroƒçno napovedjo in zakljuƒçki o tem, kako to lahko vpliva na finanƒçne trge in ceno Bitcoina.
Sahm Rule je ekonomski kazalnik, ki ga je razvila ekonomistka Claudia Sahm in slu≈æi kot zgodnji signal zaƒçetka recesije v gospodarstvu ZDA.
Temelji na trimeseƒçnem drseƒçem povpreƒçju brezposelnosti: ƒçe se dvigne za vsaj 0,50 odstotne toƒçke glede na najni≈æjo raven v preteklih 12 mesecih ‚Äî velja za signal zaƒçetka recesije.
Kazalnik prikazuje trenutne podatke za september‚Äìnovember 2025:
SAHMREALTIME ‚âà 0,23‚Äì0,43 odstotne toƒçke, odvisno od vira.
To je pod pragom 0,50, a opazna je rast v primerjavi s preteklim obdobjem.
Sahm Rule ne napoveduje recesije, temveƒç nakazuje, da se je morda ≈æe zaƒçela ali se je zaƒçela pred uradno objavo.

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 28.12.2025. According to FRED data, T10Y2Y spread on December 26, 2025 is ~0.68% (0.68 percentage points) and remains positive.
üîπ This is significantly above zero.
üîπ However below long-term average (~0.85%). ycharts.com
üîπ Spread growing compared to last year (~0.28% a year ago), indicating some curve recovery after inversion periods.
Important: earlier in 2022‚Äì2024 yield curve was deeply inverted, signaling recession risk, but in 2025 it recovered to positive territory. What this means today
Positive spread (0.68%)
‚úî means 10-year securities yield more than 2-year, corresponding to normal curve structure.
‚úî indicates investors don't expect significant economy decline in short term.
‚úî removes part of traditional alarm signals associated with inverted curve.
However:
level below historical average, showing not fully recovered curve;
if spread becomes too low and close to zero, it will be growth slowdown warning;
if it starts declining, it may indicate deteriorating economic expectations. Medium-term forecast (3‚Äì9 months)
Based on current yield curve position:
Scenario A ‚Äî Moderate recovery
Spread remains positive or increases
‚û° Investor confidence in economy continues
‚û° Curve becomes more "steep"
‚û° Recession risk remains low
‚û° Stocks: moderate growth / consolidation
‚û° Bonds: yield normalization
‚û° Bitcoin / crypto: mostly positive impact (relevant to risk appetite)
Scenario B ‚Äî Plateau or moderate spread decline
Spread remains positive but declines
‚û° Economic stagnation, uncertainty growth
‚û° Investors start reducing risk assets
‚û° Stocks: sideways or correction
‚û° Bitcoin: consolidation / moderate pressure
‚û° Bonds: increased demand for safe assets
Scenario C ‚Äî Spread falls to zero
Spread becomes close to 0 or inverts
‚û° Investor expectations skew: slowdown fear
‚û° Strengthened recession signals
‚û° Stocks: fall risk
‚û° Bitcoin: strong pressure and stock market correlation
‚û° Bonds: long-term growth as "safe haven"
Such scenario historically preceded recessions by 6‚Äì18 months. Historical context
In past cycles:
Any curve inversion usually preceded recession by 6‚Äì24 months.
In 2022‚Äì2024 curves were deeply inverted, but recession didn't occur, forcing analysts to reconsider interpretation in post-COVID economy conditions. Market impact
On stocks
‚úî Positive spread supports risk appetite
‚úî Higher difference = less economic decline fear
But if spread starts contracting:
investors may switch to safe assets
reduced confidence in corporate earnings
Bitcoin price impact
Bitcoin historically reacts to market sentiment and liquidity:
If spread strengthens (rises)
‚úî positive signal for risk assets
‚úî BTC has chance for growth or more stable consolidation
If spread starts falling
‚úî risk appetite decline
‚úî BTC more often correlates down with stocks
‚úî increased demand for safe assets (bonds, gold)
December 2025 summary
üîπ T10Y2Y = ~0.68% ‚Üí positive, not inverted
üîπ Economy: moderate stability signal
üîπ Medium-term forecast:
if difference holds or increases ‚Üí moderate market / BTC growth
if it starts declining ‚Üí possible consolidation or correction
For Bitcoin impact summarized as:
‚û° normal "positive" yield curve ‚Üí higher BTC resilience probability,
‚û° approaching zero ‚Üí increased correlation sensitivity with stocks, deeper correction risk.

ANALIZA na 28.12.2025. Po podatkih FRED je razlika T10Y2Y na 26. december 2025 ~0,68 % (0,68 odstotne toƒçke) in ostaja pozitivna.
üîπ To je bistveno nad niƒçlo.
üîπ Vendar pod dolgoroƒçnim povpreƒçjem (~0,85 %). ycharts.com
üîπ Razlika raste v primerjavi z lani (~0,28 % pred letom), kar ka≈æe na delno obnovo krivulje po obdobjih inverzije.
Pomembno: prej v letih 2022‚Äì2024 je bila krivulja donosnosti globoko inverzirana, signalizirajoƒç tveganje recesije, a leta 2025 se je obnovila v pozitivno obmoƒçje. Kaj to pomeni danes
Pozitivna razlika (0,68 %)
‚úî pomeni, da 10-letne vrednostne papirje prina≈°ajo veƒç donosnosti kot 2-letne, kar ustreza normalni strukturi krivulje.
‚úî ka≈æe, da vlagatelji ne priƒçakujejo znatnega gospodarskega padca v kratkem roku.
‚úî odpravlja del tradicionalnih alarmnih signalov, povezanih z inverzirano krivuljo.
Vendar:
raven pod zgodovinskim povpreƒçjem, kar ka≈æe na ne povsem obnovljeno krivuljo;
ƒçe razlika postane prenizka in blizu niƒçle, bo to opozorilo pred upoƒçasnitvijo rasti;
ƒçe zaƒçne padati, lahko ka≈æe na poslab≈°anje gospodarskih priƒçakovanj. Srednjeroƒçna napoved (3‚Äì9 mesecev)
Na podlagi trenutnega polo≈æaja krivulje donosnosti:
Scenarij A ‚Äî Zmerna obnova
Razlika ostane pozitivna ali se poveƒça
‚û° Zaupanje vlagateljev v gospodarstvo se nadaljuje
‚û° Krivulja postane bolj ‚Äûostra"
‚û° Tveganje recesije ostaja nizko
‚û° Delnice: zmerna rast / konsolidacija
‚û° Obveznice: normalizacija donosnosti
‚û° Bitcoin / kripto: veƒçinoma pozitiven vpliv (povezan z apetitom po tveganju)
Scenarij B ‚Äî Plato ali zmerno padanje razlike
Razlika ostane pozitivna, a pada
‚û° Gospodarska stagnacija, rast negotovosti
‚û° Vlagatelji zaƒçnejo zmanj≈°evati tvegane aktive
‚û° Delnice: stranski trend ali korekcija
‚û° Bitcoin: konsolidacija / zmeren pritisk
‚û° Obveznice: poveƒçan povpra≈°evanje po varnih aktivih
Scenarij C ‚Äî Razlika pada proti niƒçli
Razlika postane blizu 0 ali se inverzira
‚û° Pristranskost priƒçakovanj vlagateljev: strah pred upoƒçasnitvijo
‚û° Okrepljeni signali recesije
‚û° Delnice: tveganje padca
‚û° Bitcoin: moƒçan pritisk in korelacija s trgi delnic
‚û° Obveznice: rast dolgoroƒçnih kot ‚Äûvarno zatoƒçi≈°ƒçe"
Tak scenarij je zgodovinsko predhodil recesijam za 6‚Äì18 mesecev. Zgodovinski kontekst
V preteklih ciklih:
Vsaka inverzija krivulje je obiƒçajno predhodila recesijo za 6‚Äì24 mesecev.
Leta 2022‚Äì2024 so bile krivulje globoko inverzirane, a recesija ni nastopila, kar je prisililo analitike k preoblikovanju interpretacije v pogojih post-COVID gospodarstva. Vpliv na trge
Na delnice
‚úî Pozitivna razlika podpira apetit po tveganju
‚úî Vi≈°ja razlika = manj strahu pred gospodarskim padcem
A ƒçe razlika zaƒçne krƒçiti:
vlagatelji se lahko preusmerijo na varne aktive
zaupanje v korporativne dobiƒçke pada
Vpliv na ceno bitcoina
Bitcoin zgodovinsko reagira na tr≈æna razpolo≈æenja in likvidnost:
ƒåe razlika krepka (raste)
‚úî pozitiven signal za tvegane aktive
‚úî BTC ima mo≈ænost rasti ali bolj stabilne konsolidacije
ƒåe razlika zaƒçne padati
‚úî padec apetita po tveganju
‚úî BTC pogosteje korelira navzdol z delnicami
‚úî poveƒçan povpra≈°evanje po varnih aktivih (obveznice, zlato)
Povzetek december 2025
üîπ T10Y2Y = ~0,68 % ‚Üí pozitivna, ne inverzirana
üîπ Gospodarstvo: zmeren signal stabilnosti
üîπ Srednjeroƒçna napoved:
ƒçe razliko ohranijo ali poveƒçajo ‚Üí zmerna rast trgov / BTC
ƒçe zaƒçne padati ‚Üí mo≈æna konsolidacija ali korekcija
Za bitcoin vpliv povzetemo takole:
‚û° normalna ‚Äûpozitivna" krivulja donosnosti ‚Üí veƒçja verjetnost odpornosti BTC,
‚û° pribli≈æevanje niƒçli ‚Üí poveƒçana korelacijska obƒçutljivost z delnicami, tveganje globljih korekcij.

T10Y2Y je razlika (spred) med donosnostjo 10-letnih in 2-letnih ameri≈°kih dr≈æavnih obveznic.
Ta razlika odra≈æa naklon krivulje donosnosti ‚Äî eden najpomembnej≈°ih makroekonomskih kazalnikov, ki ga tradicionalno uporabljajo kot predhodnika recesije ali napovedovalca tr≈ænih razpolo≈æenj.
Ko je razlika:
pozitivna ‚Äî krivulja normalna ‚Üí signal gospodarske rasti,


blizu niƒçle/ploska ‚Äî negotovost,


negativna (inverzija) ‚Äî tveganje recesije v srednjem roku.

extra.en:
T10Y2Y is the spread between 10-year and 2-year US Treasury bond yields.
This spread reflects yield curve slope ‚Äî one of the most important macroeconomic indicators traditionally used as recession precursor or market sentiment forecast.
When spread:
positive ‚Äî normal curve ‚Üí economy growth signal,


close to zero/flat ‚Äî uncertainty,


negative (inversion) ‚Äî medium-term recession risk.

Current value as of December 28, 2025
Latest data (as of December 17, 2025):
WTREGEN = 833,093 million dollars (‚âà 833 billion USD).
This level indicates Treasury holds significant funds in Fed accounts that are not bank reserves.

What this means economically
Treasury balance in Fed reflects:
üîπ US government fiscal operations:
tax receipts,


 debt payments,


 program funding,


 debt market operations.


üîπ Cash balance after payments and receipts.
WTREGEN affects banking system liquidity through how Treasury funds move between government accounts and bank reserves. 
Medium-term forecast (3‚Äì9 months)
To assess outlook, understand three things:
1. Treasury liquidity
High WTREGEN balances mean Treasury holds large budgeted funds that can be spent on:
‚úî government program payments,
‚úî debt servicing,
‚úî expense funding.
This affects financial system liquidity:
when Treasury spends funds ‚Üí they move to banking system ‚Üí liquidity increases.


when Treasury accumulates funds ‚Üí liquidity may decrease. 



2. Liquidity and financial markets
WTREGEN often included in macro liquidity indicators, subtracted from Fed balance or other central banks to get net available liquidity. 
For example, in some combined global liquidity indexes WTREGEN used with other quantities like:
Fed balance,


reverse repo (RRPONTSYD),


other central bank assets. 


If WTREGEN grows faster than central bank assets, it may mean part of liquidity "locked" in Treasury accounts, reducing available market liquidity. 

3. Current dynamics (end 2025)
WTREGEN ‚âà 833 billion USD ‚Äî high level by historical standards. This suggests Treasury holding significant funds in reserve account rather than releasing back to banking system.
This can be interpreted as:
üîπ government accumulating liquidity,
üîπ part of funds temporarily not participating in lending/market,
üîπ may indicate conservative fiscal position (accumulation before large payments, e.g. tax or debt). 

Medium-term macroeconomic forecast
Based on current WTREGEN level:
1) Financial system liquidity
If WTREGEN remains high or continues growing:
part of bank liquidity will be "locked" in Treasury accounts,


this may limit private sector credit and investment growth,


i.e. affects overall money supply.


Medium-term consequence:
‚û° more restrained economic growth
‚û° less financial stimulation
‚û° possible moderate asset volatility

2) Inflation and interest rates
High WTREGEN balances with low Fed rate may mean:
‚úî Treasury earns income from short-term operations,
‚úî but doesn't inject these funds into economy.
This means:
liquidity remains conservative,


money expansion limited.


Potential effect:
‚û° pressure to reduce inflationary growth
‚û° stable or moderately elevated interest rates (if Fed wants to hold inflation).

Market impact
Stocks
If liquidity constrained:
investors may be more cautious with risk assets,


possible periods of weak corrections or sideways movement in stock markets.


Bonds
High WTREGEN funds may stimulate:
demand for government securities (as "safe asset"),


yield decline on long end of curve in market caution conditions.



Bitcoin price impact
Bitcoin historically sensitive to overall liquidity and risk appetite: If WTREGEN remains high or grows
‚û° excess liquidity locked in reserve account ‚Üí reduces available system money mass in economy,
‚û° reduces investor risk appetite,
‚û° reduces demand for risk assets like BTC in medium term.
High WTREGEN may:
calm Bitcoin growth,


strengthen consolidation,


reduce probability of strong bull rallies without additional external

Trenutna vrednost na 28. december 2025
Najnovej≈°i podatki (na 17. december 2025):
WTREGEN = 833.093 milijonov dolarjev (‚âà 833 milijard USD).
Ta raven ka≈æe, da Zakladnica dr≈æi znatna sredstva na raƒçunih pri Fedu, ki niso banƒçne rezerve.

Kaj to pomeni ekonomsko
Bilanca Zakladnice pri Fedu odra≈æa:
üîπ Fiskalne operacije vlade ZDA:
pristopi davkov,


plaƒçila dolgov,


financiranje programov,


operacije na trgu dolga.


üîπ Denarni balans po plaƒçilih in prilivih.
WTREGEN vpliva na likvidnost banƒçnega sistema prek tega, kako se sredstva Zakladnice premikajo med vladnimi raƒçuni in banƒçnimi rezervami. 
Srednjeroƒçna napoved (3‚Äì9 mesecev)
Za oceno perspektive je treba razumeti tri stvari:
1. Likvidnost Zakladnice
Visoki ostanki v WTREGEN pomenijo, da Zakladnica dr≈æi velika sredstva v proraƒçunu, ki jih lahko porabi za:
‚úî plaƒçila vladnih programov,
‚úî servisiranje dolga,
‚úî financiranje stro≈°kov.
To vpliva na likvidnost finanƒçnega sistema:
kdaj Zakladnica porabi sredstva ‚Üí preidejo v banƒçni sistem ‚Üí likvidnost nara≈°ƒça.


kdaj Zakladnica kopiƒçi sredstva ‚Üí likvidnost se lahko zmanj≈°a. 



2. Likvidnost in finanƒçni trgi
WTREGEN pogosto vkljuƒçujejo v makro kazalnike likvidnosti, kjer ga od≈°tejejo od bilance Feda ali drugih centralnih bank, da dobijo ƒçisto razpolo≈æljivo likvidnost. 
Na primer, v nekaterih zdru≈æenih indeksih globalne likvidnosti WTREGEN uporabljajo skupaj z drugimi koliƒçinami, kot so:
bilanca Feda,


obrnjeni repoteki (RRPONTSYD),


aktivni drugih centralnih bank. 


ƒåe WTREGEN raste hitreje kot aktivni centralnih bank, to lahko pomeni, da je del likvidnosti ‚Äûzaklenjen‚Äú na raƒçunih Zakladnice, kar zmanj≈°uje razpolo≈æljivo tr≈æno likvidnost. 

3. Trenutna dinamika (konec 2025)
WTREGEN ‚âà 833 milijard USD ‚Äî visoka raven po zgodovinskih merilih. To nakazuje, da Zakladnica dr≈æi znatna sredstva na rezervnem raƒçunu, ne da bi jih vraƒçala v banƒçni sistem.
To lahko interpretiramo takole:
üîπ vlada kopiƒçi likvidnost,
üîπ del sredstev zaƒçasno ne sodeluje pri kreditovanju/trgu,
üîπ lahko ka≈æe na konservativen fiskalni polo≈æaj (kopiƒçenje pred velikimi plaƒçili, npr. davƒçnimi ali dol≈æni≈°kimi). 

Srednjeroƒçna makroekonomska napoved
Na podlagi trenutne ravni WTREGEN:
1) Likvidnost finanƒçnega sistema
ƒåe WTREGEN ostane visok ali nadaljuje rast:
del banƒçne likvidnosti bo ‚Äûzaklenjen‚Äú na raƒçunih Zakladnice,


to lahko omeji rast kreditov in investicij v zasebnem sektorju,


tj. vpliva na skupno denarno ponudbo.


Srednjeroƒçna posledica:
‚û° bolj zadr≈æana gospodarska rast
‚û° manj finanƒçne stimulacije
‚û° mo≈æna zmerna nihljivost aktivov

2) Inflacija in obrestne mere
Visoki ostanki WTREGEN pri nizki stopnji Feda lahko pomenijo:
‚úî Zakladnica ustvarja dohodek iz kratkoroƒçnih operacij,
‚úî a ta sredstva ne vna≈°a v gospodarstvo.
To pomeni:
likvidnost ostaja konservativna,


denarna ekspanzija omejena.


Potencialni uƒçinek:
‚û° pritisk na zmanj≈°anje inflacijske rasti
‚û° stabilne ali zmerno povi≈°ane obrestne mere (ƒçe Fed ≈æeli obdr≈æati inflacijo).

Vpliv na finanƒçne trge
Delnice
ƒåe je likvidnost omejena:
vlagatelji so lahko previdnej≈°i pri tveganih aktivih,


mo≈æne faze ≈°ibkih korekcij ali stranskega trenda na trgih delnic.


Obveznice
Visoka sredstva WTREGEN lahko spodbudijo:
povpra≈°evanje po vladnih papirjih (kot ‚Äûvaren aktiv"),


zni≈æanje donosnosti na dolgem koncu krivulje v pogojih previdnosti trga.



Vpliv na ceno bitcoina
Bitcoin je zgodovinsko obƒçutljiv na skupno likvidnost in apetit po tveganju: ƒåe WTREGEN ostane visok ali raste
‚û° odveƒçna likvidnost zaklenjena na rezervnem raƒçunu ‚Üí zmanj≈°uje razpolo≈æljivo sistemske denarne mase v gospodarstvu,
‚û° zmanj≈°uje apetit po tveganju vlagateljev,
‚û° zmanj≈°uje povpra≈°evanje po tveganih aktivih kot BTC v srednjem roku.
Visok WTREGEN lahko:
upoƒçasni rast bitcoina,


okrepi konsolidacijo,


zmanj≈°a verjetnost moƒçnih bikovskih ralijev brez dodatnih zunanjih

extra.en:
WTREGEN is an economic indicator from FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data) database representing:
Liabilities and Capital: Liabilities: Deposits with F.R. Banks, Other Than Reserve Balances: U.S. Treasury, General Account: Week Average.
That is, average weekly value of US Treasury deposits in Federal Reserve System accounts, excluding bank reserve balances. 
In simpler terms:
Indicator showing how much funds US Treasury holds in Federal Reserve deposits, excluding bank reserves. 
In English sources often called Treasury General Account (TGA) ‚Äî average weekly Treasury deposits in Fed. 
WTREGEN is part of Federal Reserve H.4.1 Factors Affecting Reserve Balances report describing Fed assets and liabilities and their impact on banking system liquidity.

text.en:
The T10Y3M spread measures the difference between 10-year and 3-month U.S. Treasury yields and is considered one of the most reliable leading indicators of economic cycles.

As of late December 2025, the spread remains positive at approximately +0.50%, indicating a non-inverted yield curve. This suggests that markets do not currently anticipate an imminent recession, although the spread remains below its long-term historical average, pointing to late-cycle economic conditions rather than strong expansion.

extra.en:
Historically, sustained inversions of the T10Y3M spread have preceded U.S. recessions by 6‚Äì18 months. The current positive but narrow spread reflects cautious optimism: investors expect economic growth to continue, but at a moderate pace.

For risk assets, a positive T10Y3M spread is generally supportive. However, a decline toward zero would increase recession risk signals and raise volatility across equities and crypto markets, including Bitcoin.

text.en:
The Kansas City Financial Stress Index (KCFSI) is a composite indicator developed by the Federal Reserve Bank of Kansas City to measure stress in U.S. financial markets. It is based on 11 market variables, including interest rates, yield spreads, and volatility measures.

As of November 2025, the KCFSI stands near ‚Äì0.75, well below zero, indicating that financial stress remains lower than its historical average and that overall financial conditions are relatively calm.

extra.en:
A persistently negative KCFSI suggests stable credit conditions, adequate liquidity, and limited systemic stress. In such environments, risk assets such as equities and cryptocurrencies tend to perform more favorably, assuming no external shocks occur.

If the index were to rise toward or above zero, it would signal tightening financial conditions, increased volatility, and a potential shift toward defensive positioning across markets.

text.en:
ICE BofA US High Yield Index. ANALYSIS as of 24.12.2025. Value ‚âà 6.53% (effective yield of high-yield bonds in the US).(fred.stlouisfed.org)
This means that investors in these "junk" bonds currently receive around 6.5% annually, reflecting current risk assessments and market conditions.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
Context:
‚Äî This is below historical average (~7.8‚Äì8% or higher).(gurufocus.com)
‚Äî Not as high as in crisis periods (>10‚Äì15%).(gurufocus.com)
This indicates that credit markets are not currently under extreme stress, but not as calm as in "ideal" conditions.

Medium-term (6‚Äì12 months) market forecast
Possible directions
1) If yields continue to decline:
‚úîÔ∏è Improved investor sentiment and credit risk perception
‚úîÔ∏è Risk appetite grows ‚Äî investments in risky assets intensify
2) If yields start to rise:
Increased concerns about credit conditions and possible economic slowdown
Risk premium growth ‚Üí financial conditions tighten
In 2025 yields remain moderate ‚Äî this may reflect expectations that economy continues growing without major shocks. If investor caution regarding risks intensifies (e.g., due to deteriorating corporate earnings or rising defaults), yields may rise higher. If tightening conditions have already peaked, yields may stabilize or even decline.

Market impact
Stock market
HY yield rise ‚Üí reflects higher credit risk assessments ‚Üí may pressure stocks, especially in risky sectors.
Decline/stabilization ‚Üí risk appetite support ‚Üí stocks may strengthen.
Credit markets
Effective yield rise usually coincides with spread widening (credit becomes more expensive, investors demand compensation), indicating tighter financial conditions.
Decline or stable yield levels indicate comfortable conditions for corporate borrowing.

Bitcoin (BTC) impact
The relationship between high-yield bond yields and Bitcoin is not straightforward, but there are indirect effects through risk appetite and overall financial environment:
When HY yields fall or remain moderately stable:
‚Äî this usually reflects moderate credit risk and calm financial environment, contributing to growth of risk assets including BTC.
Sharp HY yield rise:
‚Äî alarm signal (intensified credit risk) ‚Üí investors exit risky assets ‚Üí BTC may correct more strongly than traditional markets.
Thus, high BAMLH0A0HYM2EY yields often accompany declining risk sentiment ‚Äî which may pressure BTC ‚Äî while declining yields may support more positive sentiment and capital inflows into crypto assets.

How to use BAMLH0A0HYM2EY in trading
1) Credit market conditions assessment
Rising yields ‚Üí market demands greater risk compensation ‚Üí may be early warning of declining risk appetite.
Falling/stable yields ‚Üí softer credit conditions ‚Üí favorable for risk assets.
Summary
‚úîÔ∏è BAMLH0A0HYM2EY ‚Äî effective yield of US high-yield corporate bond index (~6.5% in December 2025).(fred.stlouisfed.org)
‚úîÔ∏è Level moderate, below historical average ‚Äî reflects adequate credit conditions, not extreme.(gurufocus.com)
‚úîÔ∏è Medium-term: if yields continue declining or stabilizing ‚Äî positive for risk assets; rising yields may signal growing credit risks.
‚úîÔ∏è Stock markets and BTC: serves as indirect risk appetite marker ‚Äî rising yields may pressure BTC, declining yields support it.

Mo≈æne smeri

Kako uporabiti BAMLH0A0HYM2EY v trgovanju
1) Ocena pogojev kreditnega trga

Padanje/stabilna donosnost ‚Üí mehkej≈°i kreditni pogoji ‚Üí ugodno za tvegane aktive.
Povzetek

extra.en:
ICE BofA US High Yield Index (BAMLH0A0HYM2EY) is the data series code representing the effective yield of the ICE BofA US High Yield Index (effective yield rate for US high-yield corporate bonds rated below investment grade)
üîπ ICE BofA US High Yield Index is a widely used index tracking yields of high-risk corporate bonds (junk bonds) issued in US dollars.(CION Investments)
üîπ Index includes bonds rated below investment grade (typically BB and lower), which pay higher yields to compensate for increased credit risk.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
What this series shows:
This is the effective yield (%) that investors receive from the basket of all such bonds in the index.(fred.stlouisfed.org)
It depends on both interest rates (Treasuries) and credit risk, reflecting overall credit conditions in the market.(fred.stlouisfed.org) Simply: higher value = more expensive credit risk, investors demand higher yield for default risk.

text.en:
ANALYSIS as of 24.12.2025. Buffett Indicator According to December 2025 data, Buffett Indicator is at extremely high levels:
Approximately ~220%‚Äì226% ‚Äî market capitalization exceeds US economy size by more than double. These are historically record or near-record values, significantly above historical average (~158%). Such position means stocks trade significantly more expensive than usual relative to economy size ‚Äî i.e. market is in strong overvaluation state. Medium-term forecast
Macroeconomic logic
Indicator above 200% historically associated with extreme optimism, market overheating and potential correction risk (Buffett said levels above ~200% mean "playing with fire"). Medium
üìâ However important to remember:
‚úîÔ∏è High values don't guarantee immediate decline ‚Äî markets can stay expensive for long.
‚úîÔ∏è Overvaluation often signals lower long-term expected returns than average, even if short-term movements may continue growing.
Medium-term scenarios (6‚Äì12 months)
1. Bearish/correction scenario
If economy slows or corporate earnings stop growing, high valuations hard to sustain ‚Äî significant stock market corrections possible. 2.Sideways/stagnation
With sustained high valuations but no new growth drivers, market may consolidate. 3.Continued growth, but more moderate
If corporate earnings continue growing faster than GDP and monetary conditions remain soft, market may hold high valuations, but this will be risky position. Market and Bitcoin impact
Stocks
High Buffett Indicator indicates stocks expensively valued, usually associated with higher correction probability or low medium-term future returns.
This may make stocks vulnerable if economic data worsens or volatility rises.
Bonds
Stock overvaluation often drives investors toward bonds or safe assets during pullbacks.
However with low rates corporate bonds may remain attractive by yield.
Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies
Connection between Buffett Indicator and BTC not direct, but important indirect mechanisms exist:
When Buffett Indicator high, stock valuations expensive:
This means increased market greed (risk-on) while markets grow. Interest in Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies often rises alongside stocks during risk expansion. If high valuations lead to correction:
Market may shift to risk-off sentiment ‚Üí capital exits risky assets ‚Üí BTC may sharply correct with stocks. In other words, Buffett Indicator may serve as macro-context signal for risk appetite changes in cryptocurrencies, not as direct BTC trading signal. How to use Buffett Indicator in trading
1) Overall market valuation assessment
Very high Buffett Indicator (>200%) ‚Üí caution signal: markets already expensive ‚Äî shouldn't build unprotected long positions without hedge. Low levels (<100%) ‚Üí potentially more favorable market valuation.
Summary
‚úîÔ∏è What it shows: Buffett Indicator measures US stock market overall valuation relative to economy (GDP). vc.ru
‚úîÔ∏è Current position (December 2025): extremely high values ~220%‚Äì226%, indicating strong overvaluation. longtermtrends.com+1
‚úîÔ∏è Medium-term forecast: high overvaluation increases correction risk, but doesn't guarantee immediate reversal.
‚úîÔ∏è Market and BTC impact: may signal increased risk appetite, but also increased vulnerability to declines if conditions worsen.
‚úîÔ∏è In trading: use as macro-valuation indicator combined with other signals for risk management, not as standalone trading signal.
text.si:
ANALIZA na 24.12.2025. Kazalnik Buffetta Po podatkih za december 2025 je kazalnik Buffetta na ekstremno visokih nivojih:
Pribli≈æno ~220 %‚Äì226 % ‚Äî tr≈æna kapitalizacija presega velikost gospodarstva ZDA veƒç kot dvakrat. To so zgodovinsko rekordne ali skoraj rekordne vrednosti, bistveno nad zgodovinskim povpreƒçjem (~158 %). Tak polo≈æaj pomeni, da se delnice trgujejo bistveno dra≈æje kot obiƒçajno glede na velikost gospodarstva ‚Äî tj. trg je v stanju moƒçne precenjenosti. Srednjeroƒçna napoved
Makroekonomska logika
Kazalnik nad 200 % je zgodovinsko povezan z ekstremnim optimizmom, pregrevanjem trga in potencialnim tveganjem korekcije (Buffett je rekel, da nivoji nad ~200 % pomenijo ‚Äûigranje z ognjem"). Medium
üìâ Vendar je pomembno vedeti:
‚úîÔ∏è Visoke vrednosti ne zagotavljajo takoj≈°njega padca ‚Äî trgi lahko ostanejo dragi dolgo ƒçasa.
‚úîÔ∏è Precenjenost pogosto signalizira ni≈æje dolgoroƒçne priƒçakovane donosnosti kot povpreƒçje, ƒçeprav lahko kratkoroƒçna gibanja nadaljujejo rast.
Srednjeroƒçni scenariji (6‚Äì12 mesecev)
1. Medvedji/korektivni scenarij
ƒåe se gospodarstvo upoƒçasni ali korporativni dobiƒçki prenehajo rasti, visokim ocenam te≈æko vzdr≈æevati ‚Äî mo≈æne so znatne korekcije na borznem trgu. 2.Stranski trend/stagnacija
Ob ohranjanju visokih ocen, a brez novih gonilcev rasti, se lahko trg konsolidira. 3.Nadaljevanje rasti, a bolj zmerno
ƒåe korporativni dobiƒçki nadaljujejo rast hitreje kot BDP in monetarni pogoji ostanejo mehki, lahko trg ohrani visoke ocene, a bo to tvegana pozicija. Vpliv na trge in bitcoin
Delnice
Visok kazalnik Buffetta ka≈æe, da so delnice drago ocenjene, kar je obiƒçajno povezano z vi≈°jo verjetnostjo korekcij ali niskimi srednjeroƒçnimi prihodnjimi donosnostmi.
To lahko delnice naredi ranljive v primeru poslab≈°anja ekonomskih podatkov ali rasti nihljivosti.
Obveznice
Precnenost delnic pogosto vodi vlagatelje proti obveznicam ali varnim aktivom v obdobjih padcev.
Vendar pri nizkih obrestnih merah lahko korporativne obveznice ostanejo privlaƒçne po donosnosti.
Bitcoin in kriptovalute
Povezava med kazalnikom Buffetta in BTC ni neposredna, a obstajajo pomembni posredni mehanizmi:
Ko je kazalnik Buffetta visok, so ocene delnic drage:
To pomeni poveƒçano tr≈æno pohlep (risk-on), dokler trgi rastejo. Interes za bitcoin in kriptovalute pogosto nara≈°ƒça skupaj z delnicami v obdobju ≈°iritve tveganja. ƒåe visoke ocene vodijo v korekcijo:
Trg se lahko preusmeri v risk-off razpolo≈æenje ‚Üí kapitali be≈æijo iz tveganih aktivov ‚Üí BTC se lahko moƒçno korigira skupaj z delnicami. Z drugimi besedami, kazalnik Buffetta lahko slu≈æi kot makrokontekstni signal za spremembe apetita po tveganju v kriptovalutah, ne kot neposreden trgovalni signal za BTC. Kako uporabiti kazalnik Buffetta v trgovanju
1) Ocena splo≈°ne tr≈æne ocene
Zelo visok kazalnik Buffetta (>200 %) ‚Üí signal previdnosti: trgi so ≈æe dragi ‚Äî ni smiselno neupraviƒçeno poveƒçevati dolgih pozicij brez za≈°ƒçite. Nizke ravni (<100 %) ‚Üí potencialno ugodnej≈°a tr≈æna ocena.
Povzetek
‚úîÔ∏è Kaj prikazuje: Kazalnik Buffetta meri splo≈°no oceno borznega trga ZDA glede na gospodarstvo (BDP). vc.ru
‚úîÔ∏è Trenutni polo≈æaj (december 2025): ekstremno visoke vrednosti ~220 %‚Äì226 %, ki ka≈æejo na moƒçno precenjenost. longtermtrends.com+1
‚úîÔ∏è Srednjeroƒçna napoved: visoka precenjenost poveƒçuje tveganje korekcije, a ne zagotavlja takoj≈°nje obraƒçanje.
‚úîÔ∏è Vpliv na trge in BTC: lahko signalizira poveƒçan apetit po tveganju, a tudi poveƒçano ranljivost za padce ob poslab≈°anju pogojev.
‚úîÔ∏è V trgovanju: uporabljajte kot makro-ocenovalni kazalnik v kombinaciji z drugimi signali za upravljanje tveganj, ne kot samostojen trgovalni signal.

Buffett Indicator is the ratio of total market capitalization of all publicly traded companies to country's gross domestic product (GDP) (usually US). It shows how "expensive" stock market is relative to economy size. Often called Warren Buffett's "favorite indicator" for overall market valuation. 
Formula:
Buffett Indicator=Market CapTotalGDP‚Äã√ó100%
Where:
Total Market Cap ‚Äî market capitalization of entire stock exchange (often measured via Wilshire 5000).


GDP ‚Äî US gross domestic product for the year. smart-lab.ru


Interpretation (on historical levels):
< ~100%: market may be undervalued.


~100‚Äì135%: normal (near average) valuation.


~160%: market overvaluation (high correction risks).

Kazalnik Buffetta je razmerje med skupno tr≈æno kapitalizacijo vseh javno kotiranih podjetij in bruto domaƒçim proizvodom (BDP) dr≈æave (obiƒçajno ZDA). Prikazuje, kako ‚Äûdrago‚Äú je borzni trg glede na velikost gospodarstva. To pogosto imenujejo ‚Äûljubljeni kazalnik" Warrena Buffetta za splo≈°no tr≈æno oceno. 
Formula:
Kazalnik Buffetta=Skupna tr≈æna kapitalizacijaBDP√ó100%
Kjer:
Skupna tr≈æna kapitalizacija ‚Äî tr≈æna kapitalizacija celotne borze (pogosto merjeno prek Wilshire 5000).


BDP ‚Äî bruto domaƒçi proizvod ZDA za leto. smart-lab.ru


Interpretacija (na zgodovinskih nivojih):
< ~100 %: trg je lahko podcenjen.


~100‚Äì135 %: normalna (blizu povpreƒçne) ocena.


~160 %: precenjenost trga (visoka tveganja korekcije).

Current market state (facts as of today)
Price
Current Bitcoin price around $91,000‚Äì$92,000 after attempts to break above $93,000 and a slight correction. Since the beginning of the year, upward movement has been observed with resistance at key levels and market focus on the range.
Trading Volume
Volume remains relatively stable but without extreme spikes, characteristic of consolidation phase after the start of the year. Increase in spot sector volumes was noticeable during attempts to grow above nearby resistances.
Open Interest
Data from aggregators shows that Bitcoin futures open interest is at a high level (around 640,000‚Äì650,000 BTC, equivalent to tens of billions of dollars), but in recent days there has been a slightly moderate reduction (OI decrease), interpreted as "controlled deleveraging" without sharp sell-offs.
On individual exchanges OI remains significant, but recent changes indicate that some traders are moderately reducing risk ‚Äî this is not panic liquidation, but rather partial position closure (de-risking).

Price, Volume, and Open Interest Interaction
Price and Volume
‚Äî Volume supports recent upward movements, indicating that growth is confirmed by trading activity, not weak volume background. This is a positive moment.
Open Interest and Price
‚Äî High OI plus price growth ‚Äî usually a sign that new capital is entering the market.
‚Äî Slight OI reduction in recent days with price movements folded in range indicates partial position closure by traders, which may reduce short-term volatility and price pressure. However, OI level still remains high, meaning interest in derivatives persists.

Movement Forecast
Short-term (1‚Äì4 weeks)
Current data indicates range movement with upward bias, but without impulsive breakout of levels above $93,000‚Äì$95,000.
If price holds above key supports (approximately $88,000‚Äì$90,000) with stable volume, this could shift balance toward recovery of buyer interest.
Slight OI reduction indicates that part of risky positions is already closed. This may reduce probability of strong correction, but also potential for sharp rise without new capital inflow.
Short-term trend: sideways with potential upward bias, but fluctuations in current levels range possible.

Medium-term (1‚Äì3 months)
If in coming weeks:
OI starts growing again against price growth,
volumes continue supporting movement above local resistance,
then medium-term transition to more sustainable uptrend possible, with repeated attempt to attack levels above $100,000, which previously represented significant psychological and technical levels.
If volume doesn't continue growing and OI keeps declining further, this may indicate momentum fading and longer consolidation in range.
Medium-term trend: neutral-bullish, with volume and OI growth confirmation.

Long-term (6+ months)
Long-term open interest remains high in historical context, indicating preservation of significant interest from derivative traders and institutional participants, even despite correction periods in 2025.
If global macroeconomic liquidity background remains favorable and institutional flows continue into BTC (through spot ETFs and derivative instruments), this creates foundation for sustainable growth in long-term perspective.
Long-term trend: overall bullish, but with correction periods and consolidation phase due to cyclical market nature.

How this reflects on markets
Bitcoin consolidation phase reflects current balance between spot and derivative strategies. OI concentration at high levels with stable volumes indicates that large participants haven't "left the market", but also not forcing risk expansion.
For traditional markets such cryptocurrency risk dynamics often correlates with increased caution in risky assets overall.

Practical analysis summary
Price holds in range above resistances, volume sufficient to maintain current range.
Open interest remains high, OI fluctuations indicate not panic, but controlled partial position closure ‚Äî this stabilizes market short-term.
Short-term consolidation likely with moderate growth potential above current levels with volume confirmation.
Medium-term reversal to more confident upward tendency possible with volume growth and rising OI recovery.
Long-term institutional traders interest and high OI historically correlate with Bitcoin upward dynamics continuation.
